data.enText: an amount of a medicine or a drug that is taken once, or regularly over a period of time

data.chText: 大 / 小 / 致死剂量
data.enText: a high/low/lethal dose

data.chText: 如果需要，12小时后再服一剂。
data.enText: Repeat the dose after 12 hours if necessary.
an amount of sth

data.chText: 一场感冒使得我上不了班。
data.enText: A dose of flu kept me off work.

data.chText: 核电站的工作人员受到大量辐射。
data.enText: Workers at the nuclear plant were exposed to high doses of radiation.
I can cope with her in small doses (= for short amounts of time) .
like a dose of salts
very fast and easily
a taste/dose of your own medicine
the same bad treatment that you have given to others

data.chText: 让那个恶棍得到报应吧。
data.enText: Let the bully have a taste of his own medicine.
to give sb/yourself a medicine or drug

data.chText: 她给自己服了一些维生素片。
data.enText: She dosed herself up with vitamin pills.
He was heavily dosed with painkillers.
like a dose of salts
very fast and easily
a taste/dose of your own medicine
the same bad treatment that you have given to others

data.chText: 让那个恶棍得到报应吧。
data.enText: Let the bully have a taste of his own medicine.

similar_word: Lucy in the sky with diamonds
tr: street name for lysergic acid diethylamide
a measured portion of medicine taken at any one time
the quantity of an active agent (substance or radiation) taken in or absorbed at any one time
a communicable infection transmitted by sexual intercourse or genital contact

value.def: A dose of medicine or a drug is a measured amount of it which is intended to be taken at one time.

example.ex: One dose of penicillin can wipe out the infection.
example.tran: 一剂青霉素就能消除感染。

value.def: You can refer to an amount of something as a dose of that thing, especially when you want to emphasize that there is a great deal of it.

example.ex: She was born with a healthy dose of self-confidence...
The West is getting a heavy dose of snow and rain today.
example.tran: 西部今天将迎来一场大的雨夹雪。

value.tran: (尤指数量很多的)一份，一次，一点

value.def: If you dose a person or animal with medicine, you give them an amount of it.

example.ex: The doctor fixed the rib, dosed him heavily with drugs, and said he would probably get better...
example.tran: 医生接好了肋骨，给他服用了大剂量的药，并说他可能会有所好转。

example.ex: I dosed him up with Valium.

trans: 单剂量；一次剂量；单次剂量；一次照射；单一剂量
负荷量；速效剂量；负荷剂量；突击剂量；负载剂量
阈剂量；阈浓度；临界剂量；低限剂量；阈值剂量
